channel.title: Errors not letting me use Dragon - Age client
channel.description: This is happening and I do not know what to do.

item.title: Errors not letting me use Dragon - Age client
item.dc:creator: @Kattoor Snow_
item.description:
@Kattoor wrote:

Your client tries to download a file at www.client.dragon-ages.org/version.txt.
Since this file doesn’t exist on that domain, you’ll need to create your own version.txt file.
You’ll need to see what your client expects of the version.txt file in order to create your on.
Furthermore you will have to change the link in your code from “client.dragon-ages.org/version.txt” to whatever link you upload your version.txt to.

Read full topic
item.source: Errors not letting me use Dragon - Age client
